title: Looking for--T206 HOF Lot, sold on ebay 1/12 (contained Evers, Matty, Dahlen, Kling)
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: Looking for--T206 HOF Lot, sold on ebay 1/12 (contained Evers, Matty, Dahlen, Kling)
posts.post_content:
This lot totally flew unobserved past my radar. In the attached photos, you will observe a sneaky little bugger hiding amongst a nice assortment of Hall of Famers. This little guy is a Johnny Kling Old Mill, graded SGC 4--I would love the opportunity to purchase this for my back run. I have PayPal ready to make a generous offer. Please contact me if you purchased the lot and would be interested in parting with the Kling!
Thank you very much,
NJ :]
[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]

all for $650!  Somebody got an amazing deal!

edit:  oops, just checked watch count - the lot sold for $500 - wow

[url]http://www.watchcount.com/?uqsrc=decl&uqkw=201782163219#serp[/url]

edit:  oops, just checked watch count - the lot sold for $500 - wow

[url]http://www.watchcount.com/?uqsrc=decl&uqkw=201782163219#serp[/url][/QUOTE]

500?! It was a mega steal indeed, probably part of the reason why it hurts so much :(. Thank you for the watchcount link, I never knew a website such as this existed.
I have tried reaching out to the seller for more information, but to no avail. I can now only hope the buyer splits up the lot.
Searching,
NJ :)
